summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for BuidlGuidl/SpeedRunEthereum-v2 in August 2025

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Merged several enhancements including the **Sidequests UI** (#310) and **related guides for the dice game challenge** (#301).
  - Implemented a **new batch public endpoint** (#271) and added **network selection to batch** (#270).
  - Improved user experience with **auto-refresh on challenge submission** (#274) and **loading state notifications** (#293).

- **Notable Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved issues with **wallet disconnection** (#300) and **XP calculation** (#296).
  - Fixed **social notifications** (#299) and addressed a **timeout issue** with grading submissions (#290).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - The focus was on enhancing user experience through UI improvements and better functionality.
  - A significant number of bug fixes were addressed, improving overall system stability and user interactions.

topIssues.title: Move CTA on challenge detail page
Content edit request: Front-Running & MEV Mitigation guide.
Notifications behind the overlay on Update Socials
Bug: Can't disconnect wallet on challenge pages

topPRs.title: Script to update onchain data for existing users (+ throw errors instead of error silently)
Update fetchOnchainData so it includes sideQuests
Use nextjs after instead of waitUntil
Add related guides to dice game challenge
SideQuests: initial snapshot to DB on user registration
